Articles.Content: Okay everyone, I am going to buy a play station 4 very soon, however one question that I want to ask if i can download ksp from my PC, and if I could, how would I do it? And, can I download my mods the onto it? (1.2 release date!!!!!!!!)

You can't play the PC version on console. You will need to purchase KSP for console on your digital marketplace/store. I believe the current console version is 1.1. Be warned, the PS4 version is still awaiting a patch for the save corruption bug.
